agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents routine inspections of pesticide businesses, storage of pesticides, and other uses of and the investigation of complaints received by the Office of Pesticide Services that result in the issuance of an action. This series may include, but is not limited to: inspections, violations and resolutions.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_title: Applicator Certification Files: Commercial; Registered Technician; and Private
series_description: This series documents the certification of registered and commercial and private applicators. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, examinations, certification of registration forms, and correspondence.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents requests to use a pesticide under an emergency exemption when a serious pest problem the production of agricultural goods or public health, but no pesticides are currently registered for that situation. This series may include, but is not limited to: product information and responses to the request.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the issuance of permits for the experimental use of pesticides which are not fully registered public use. This series may include, but is not limited to: permits, correspondence, and support documentation.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents routine inspections of pesticide businesses, storage of pesticides, and other uses of pesticides in which no violations are cited and that do not result in the issuance of an enforcement action. This series may include, is not limited to: inspections and findings.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the applications for and licensing of Virginia businesses for pesticide business licenses. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, pesticide business license exams, insurance forms, receipts, and correspondence.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the authorization for individuals to proctor tests for private applicators and registered technicians. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications and contact information.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_title: Product Registration and Special Local Needs Files (Section 24c)
series_description: This series documents the registration of pesticide products by the Office of Pesticide Services and requests to use a in a manner not identified on the product label. This series include, but is not limited to: new product applications, renewal applications, pesticide product labels, safety data sheets, bulletins, and responses received seeking short term permission to use products in a manner not identified on the product label, including the name and description of the and responses to the request.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the training of non-certified individuals provide training to workers or handlers. This series may include, but is not limited to: training-provider agreement training verification cards, and correspondence.
